Name: Blinding Attacks
OtherEffect: The target is blinded (save ends).

Name: Concussion
OtherEffect: The target is stunned (save ends).

Name: Frighten
OtherEffect: The target is frightened of you (save ends).

Name: Knockdown
OtherEffect: The target falls prone.

Name: Poison Attack
OtherEffect: The target is poisoned until the end of its next turn.

Name: Sticky Floor
SpellDesc: The targeted area is difficult terrain until the start of your next turn.

Name: Barrier
SpellDesc: The targeted area is impassable and grants total cover.

Name: Zone of Darkness
SpellDesc: The targeted area is filled with magical darkness.

Name: Zone of Pain
SpellDesc: The targeted area is unstable. Creatures which move into or end their turn within the area take damage.

Name: Explosive Force
OtherEffect: All enemies are knocked away from the center of the area.

Name: Get Over Here
OtherEffect: The target is pulled up to 10 ft. towards you.

Name: Pinning Attack
OtherEffect: The target is restrained (save ends).

Name: Knockback
OtherEffect: The target is pushed up to 10 ft. from you.

Name: Reshuffle
OtherEffect: You move both yourself and the target 5 ft. in any direction. This movement doesn't trigger opportunity attacks.

Name: Raise Shield
OtherEffect: You gain +2 AC and advantage on one saving throw of your choice until the end of your next turn.

Name: Immunity
OtherEffect: You are immune to one damage type or one condition of your choice until the end of your next turn.

Name: Determination
OtherEffect: Requires you are below 25% hit points. You gain temporary hit points equal to twice your combat level

Name: Relentless
OtherEffect: When you are reduced to 0 hit points, you are instead reduced to 1 hit point.

Name: Shockproof
OtherEffect: Requires you have at least 25% hit points. Until the end of your next turn, any critical hit made against you counts as a normal hit.

Name: Get Behind Me
SpellDesc: Until the effect ends, adjacent allies count as having three-quarters cover.

Name: Hit Me
SpellDesc: A marked creature has disadvantage on any attack roll that doesn't include you.
OtherEffect: The creature is marked.

Name: Shield Wall
OtherEffect: You grant an adjacent target total cover until the start of your next turn. You must remain adjacent to the target to maintain this effect.

Name: Got Your Back
OtherEffect: If you are adjacent to an ally that is the target of an attack which doesn't include you, you can redirect the attack onto yourself.

Name: I'm Right Beside You
OtherEffect: When a nearby ally is attacked, you can move up to half your speed towards that ally.

Name: Watchful
OtherEffect: Until the end of your next turn, creatures always provoke opportunity attacks from you (even if they disengage before leaving your reach).

Name: Difficult Space
OtherEffect: The spaces within your reach are difficult terrain to enemies.

Name: Stick Around
OtherEffect: The target is grappled by you.

Name: Dangerous Area
OtherEffect: Any enemy that starts their turn within or moves into your reach takes damage equal to your combat level (once per turn).

Name: Trip
OtherEffect: Whenever you hit a target with an opportunity attack, the target falls prone.

Name: Deathtouch
OtherEffect: Whenever you critically hit a creature with an attack, the creature immediately gains one failed death saving throw.

Name: The Grave Beckons
OtherEffect: The target loses one unspent hit die

Name: Piercing Wounds
OtherEffect: Choose one damage type. Until the end of your next turn, your abilities ignore resistance to this damage and treat immunity as resistance.

Name: Marked for Death
OtherEffect: Whenever you hit a creature within 30 ft. of you that has 50% hit points or more, the creature is Marked for Death. While Marked, if the creature is reduced to 0 hit points, it suffers instant death.

Name: System Shock
OtherEffect: Whenever you reduce a target to 0 hit points, it gains one level of exhaustion.

Name: Stay Down
OtherEffect: If the target is prone, it becomes restrained until the end of your next turn.

Name: Hold Still
OtherEffect: Whenever you hit a target that moved 10 ft. or less during its last turn, the target falls prone.

Name: Sneak Attack
OtherEffect: Whenever you hit a target with an attack roll with advantage, you deal additional damage equal to your combat level.

Name: Jump Scare
OtherEffect: If the target is blinded or frightened, it becomes stunned until the end of your next turn.

Name: Pressure Point
OtherEffect: If the target is restrained, it becomes paralyzed until the end of your next turn.

Name: Guerilla
OtherEffect: Until the end of your next turn, you don't reveal yourself or your place of hiding if you make an attack while hidden.

Name: Vanish
OtherEffect: You become invisible. Making an attack or casting a spell ends this effect.

Name: Camouflage
OtherEffect: You blend into your surroundings and become compeltely indistinguishable from the environment. Moving, making an attack, or casting a spell ends this effect.

Name: Smoke Bomb
OtherEffect: The area is heavily obscured until the end of your next turn.

Name: Flash Bomb
OtherEffect: Targets are blinded until the end of their next turn.
